assistance_listing_number.description: If known, the full Assistance Listing Number for grants, cooperative agreements, loans and loan commitments.
assistance_listing_number.title: Assistance Listing Number

award_amount.description: For a covered Federal action where there has been an award or loan commitment by the Federal agency, enter the Federal amount of the award/loan commitment of the prime entity identified in item 4 or 5.
award_amount.title: Award Amount

federal_action_number.description: Enter the most appropriate Federal identifying number available for the Federal action, identified in item 1 (e.g., Request for Proposal (RFP) number, invitation for Bid (IFB) number, grant announcement number, the contract, grant, or loan award number, the application/proposal control number assigned by the Federal agency). Include prefixes, e.g.,
federal_action_number.title: Federal Action Number

federal_action_status.description: Identify the status of the covered Federal action.
federal_action_status.title: Status of Federal Action

federal_action_type.description: Identify the type of covered Federal action for which lobbying activity is and/or has been secured to influence the outcome of a covered Federal action.
federal_action_type.title: Type of Federal Action

federal_agency_department.description: Enter the name of the Federal Department or Agency making the award or loan commitment.
federal_agency_department.title: Federal Department/Agency

federal_program_name.description: Federal Program Name/Description: Federal program name or description for the covered Federal action.
federal_program_name.title: Federal Program Name/Description

street1.description: Enter the first line of the Street Address.
street1.title: Street 1

street2.description: Enter the second line of the Street Address.
street2.title: Street 2

zip_code.description: Enter the nine-digit Postal Code (e.g., ZIP code).
zip_code.title: Zip / Postal Code

suffix.description: Select the suffix from the provided list or enter a new suffix not provided on the list.
suffix.title: Suffix

last_report_date.description: Enter the date of the previously submitted report by this reporting entity for this covered Federal action.
last_report_date.title: Material Change Date of Last Report

street1.description: Enter the first line of the Street Address.
street1.title: Street 1

street2.description: Enter the second line of the Street Address.
street2.title: Street 2

zip_code.description: Enter the nine-digit Postal Code (e.g., ZIP code).
zip_code.title: Zip / Postal Code

suffix.description: Select the suffix from the provided list or enter a new suffix not provided on the list.
suffix.title: Suffix

material_change_quarter.description: If this is a follow up report caused by a material change to the information previously reported, enter the quarter in which the change occurred.
material_change_quarter.title: Material Change Quarter

material_change_year.description: If this is a follow up report caused by a material change to the information previously reported, enter the year in which the change occurred.
material_change_year.title: Material Change Year

report_type.description: Identify the appropriate classification of this report.  If this is a follow up report caused by a material change to the information previously reported, enter the year and quarter in which the change occurred.  Enter the date of the previously submitted report by this reporting entity for this covered Federal action.
report_type.title: Report Type

street1.description: Enter the first line of the Street Address.
street1.title: Street 1

street2.description: Enter the second line of the Street Address.
street2.title: Street 2

zip_code.description: Enter the nine-digit Postal Code (e.g., ZIP code).
zip_code.title: Zip / Postal Code

congressional_district.description: Enter the Congressional District in the format: 2 character state Abbreviation - 3 character District Number. Examples: CA-005 for California's 5th district, CA-012 for California's 12th district.
congressional_district.title: Congressional District

entity_type.description: Check the appropriate classification of the reporting entity that designates if it is, or expects to be, a prime subaward recipient.
entity_type.title: Entity Type

street1.description: Enter the first line of the Street Address.
street1.title: Street 1

street2.description: Enter the second line of the Street Address.
street2.title: Street 2

zip_code.description: Enter the nine-digit Postal Code (e.g., ZIP code).
zip_code.title: Zip / Postal Code

congressional_district.description: Enter the Congressional District in the format: 2 character state Abbreviation - 3 character District Number. Examples: CA-005 for California's 5th district, CA-012 for California's 12th district.
congressional_district.title: Congressional District

tier.description: Identify the tier of the subawardee, e.g., the first subawardee of the prime is the 1st tier.
tier.title: Reporting Entity Tier

suffix.description: Select the suffix from the provided list or enter a new suffix not provided on the list.
suffix.title: Suffix

telephone.description: Enter the telephone number of the certifying official.
telephone.title: Signature Telephone Number

title.description: Enter the title of the Certifying Official.
title.title: Signature Title
